description:
Every good home needs a good foundation. This 2 person Lyra footprint keeps your home away from home protected when you’re out in the wild.

  • It is made of durable and waterproof 68 D taffeta polyester to extend the life of your tent
  • In the vestibule area, the footprint acts like a carpet and reduces dirt inside the tent
  • It also helps to decrease condensation build up inside the tent
  • The footprint can also be used as a standalone tarp against rain, wind and sun by using poles or guylines
name: Exped Lyra 2-person Footprint
